splits.name: ca65_overview_and_authors
splits.description: ca65 assembler overview: cc65 C compiler toolchain macro assembler, authors Ullrich von Bassewitz Greg King Oliver Schmidt

splits.name: ca65_design_and_features
splits.description: ca65 assembler design criteria and features: open source portable assembler, supports 6502 65SC02 65C02 65816 CPU targets, relocatable output ld65 linker, C compiler backend, multiple segments, conditional assembly, powerful macro language, listing output, unlimited symbols, nested scoping

splits.name: ca65_usage_and_options
splits.description: ca65 command line usage and options: -D define symbols, -I include search path, -U mark symbols undefined, -g debug info, -l listing file, -mm memory model, -o output file, -s enable smart mode, -t target system, -v verbose output, --auto-import, --bin-include-dir, --cpu target CPU 6502 65SC02 65C02 65816 4510 HuC6280, --create-dep dependency file, --feature, --listing, --list-bytes, --pagelength, --smart, --target, search paths INCLUDE CA65_INC, input format rules

splits.name: ca65_input_format_and_syntax
splits.description: ca65 input format and syntax: source file format, comments semicolon and C-style, labels identifiers, mnemonics, operands, number formats hex $ octal % binary decimal, string constants, character mapping, CPU instruction sets .setcpu 6502 65SC02 65C02 65816 4510 HuC6280 sweet16, conditional assembly .if .else .endif, expression syntax

splits.name: ca65_expressions
splits.description: ca65 expression syntax: integer arithmetic in expressions, operator precedence, unary operators - ~ .bitnot .lobyte .hibyte .bankbyte < > ^, binary operators + - * / .mod .bitand .bitor .bitxor .shl .shr = <> < > <= >=, .and .or .xor .not logical operators, boolean expressions, constant vs non-constant expressions, expression evaluation order

splits.name: ca65_symbols_and_labels
splits.description: ca65 symbols and labels: label definitions with colon, cheap local labels starting with @, unnamed labels : and :+ :- references, symbol tables, import export .import .export .global .importzp .exportzp, linker resolution, .define text substitution macros, .undefine, symbol attributes .addrsize

splits.name: ca65_scopes
splits.description: ca65 scoping: .scope .endscope named and unnamed scopes, .proc .endproc procedure scopes, lexical scoping rules, nested scopes, scope resolution operator ::, global scope, explicit scope access, cheap local label scoping, scope search order, .enum .endenum enumeration scopes

splits.name: ca65_address_sizes_and_memory_models
splits.description: ca65 address sizes and memory models: zeropage direct 8-bit, absolute 16-bit, far 24-bit, long 32-bit, .addr .faraddr, memory model selection --memory-model, near far huge addressing, 65816 bank addressing

splits.name: ca65_pseudo_variables
splits.description: ca65 pseudo variables: * or .PC current program counter, .APTS true if address size zeropage, .CPU current CPU constant, .PARAMCOUNT macro parameter count, .TIME compilation time, .VERSION ca65 version number

splits.name: ca65_pseudo_functions
splits.description: ca65 pseudo functions: .ADDRSIZE address size of symbol, .BANK bank number, .BANKBYTE bank byte, .BLANK check blank, .CONCAT string concatenation, .CONST check constant, .DEF .DEFINED check symbol defined, .HIBYTE high byte, .HIWORD high word, .IDENT string to identifier, .LEFT .RIGHT .MID string slicing, .LOBYTE low byte, .LOWORD low word, .MATCH pattern matching, .MAX .MIN min max, .REF .REFERENCED check referenced, .SIZEOF size of, .SPRINTF formatted string, .STRAT string char at, .STRING convert to string, .STRLEN string length, .TCOUNT token count, .XMATCH exact match

splits.name: ca65_control_commands
splits.description: ca65 control commands directives: .A8 .A16 accumulator size, .ADDR word address, .ALIGN boundary alignment, .ASSERT assertions, .AUTOIMPORT, .BSS .CODE .DATA .RODATA .ZEROPAGE segment selection, .BYTE .WORD .DWORD .DBYT data definition, .CASE case sensitivity, .CHARMAP character mapping, .CONDES module constructors destructors, .CONSTRUCTOR .DESTRUCTOR, .DEFINE text macros, .DELMACRO delete macro, .ELSE .ELSEIF .ENDIF .IF .IFDEF .IFNDEF .IFBLANK .IFNBLANK .IFCONST .IFREF conditional assembly, .END end of input, .ENDMACRO .ENDPROC .ENDSCOPE .ENDSTRUCT .ENDUNION, .ENUM .ENDENUM, .ERROR .WARNING .FATAL messages, .EXPORT .EXPORTZP .GLOBAL .GLOBALZP .IMPORT .IMPORTZP symbol import export, .FEATURE enable features, .FILEOPT .FOPT file options, .FORCEIMPORT, .INCLUDE file inclusion, .INCBIN binary file inclusion, .LINECONT line continuation, .LIST .LISTBYTES listing control, .LOCAL local variables, .LOCALCHAR local char prefix, .MACPACK macro package, .MAC .ENDMAC .MACRO macro definition, .ORG origin address, .OUT .PAGELENGTH, .PC02 .PSC02 .P816 .P02 .P4510 .PH6280 CPU selection, .POPSEG .PUSHSEG segment stack, .PROC .ENDPROC, .RELOC relocatable, .REPEAT .ENDREP repetition, .RES reserve space, .SCOPE .ENDSCOPE, .SEGMENT named segments, .SET reassignable symbols, .SETCPU CPU selection, .STRUCT .ENDSTRUCT .UNION .ENDUNION structures unions, .TAG structure instances

splits.name: ca65_macros
splits.description: ca65 macro system: .macro .endmacro definition, parameterized macros, .paramcount parameter count, .match .xmatch parameter matching, default parameter values, recursive macros, .exitmacro early exit, local symbols in macros .local, C-style .define text macros, .undefine, .delmacro deleting macros, macro overloading, variadic macros, macro expansion, macro packages .macpack

splits.name: ca65_macro_packages
splits.description: ca65 macro packages .macpack: generic package with .add .sub helpers, longbranch package jeq jne jmi jpl jcc jcs jvc jvs for out-of-range branches, apple2 scrcode for Apple II screen codes, atari scrcode for Atari screen codes, cbm scrcode for CBM/PET screen codes for C64 VIC-20 Plus4, module package for module structure

splits.name: ca65_predefined_constants
splits.description: ca65 predefined constants: CPU_6502 CPU_65SC02 CPU_65C02 CPU_65816 CPU_SWEET16 CPU_HUC6280 CPU_4510 CPU_ISET_6502 CPU_ISET_65SC02 CPU_ISET_65C02 CPU_ISET_65816 bitmask constants for CPU detection, .CPU pseudo variable for conditional assembly based on target processor

splits.name: ca65_structs_and_unions
splits.description: ca65 structs and unions: .struct .endstruct structure definition, named and unnamed members, .byte .word .dword .res member types, nested structures, .union .endunion shared memory layout, .sizeof for size calculation, .tag for instantiation, member access with :: scope operator, struct offsets for assembly data structures

splits.name: ca65_module_constructors_destructors
splits.description: ca65 module constructors and destructors: .condes .constructor .destructor module initialization and cleanup, priority ordering, intermodule dependencies, automatic init and shutdown code execution, library module support

splits.name: ca65_porting_from_other_assemblers
splits.description: ca65 porting sources from other assemblers: differences from other 6502 assemblers, TASS compatibility .feature, label syntax differences, expression operator differences, pseudo-opcode mapping, common migration issues and solutions, .feature loose_string_term .feature labels_without_colons .feature pc_assignment
